import sys

def main():
    answers = [0,0]
    val = 0
    for i in xrange(1,5000):
        val += i*2
        answers.append(val-i)
        answers.append(val)
    inp = [int(i.strip()) for i in sys.stdin.read().split()]
    out = ""
    t = inp[0]
    for _ in xrange(1,t+1):
        out+=str(answers[inp[_]])+"\n"
    print out[:-1]
main()
